name: newsblur
tagline: A feature rich RSS reader with social and training features
description: NewsBlur is a feature-rich, self-hosted RSS reader with social features, saved stories, and training filters. It supports folders, tags, web and mobile clients, and optional hosted services.

features.title: Rss Feed Reader
features.description: Subscribe to and organize feeds from blogs, news sites, and podcasts

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Train filters to highlight or hide stories based on keywords, authors, or tags

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Archive articles for later reading with tags and search functionality

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Native iOS and Android clients sync reading progress across devices

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Group feeds into folders and subfolders for structured content management

features.title: Unread Management
features.description: Mark stories as read automatically or manually with flexible reading modes
